Text:
Thank you very much! I'm looking forward to the rest (8) innings also :-)

Will seed, as I have done (does) on this torrent also!
Excellent documentary for Baseball game lovers. Do you know when I can find the spanish subtitles? Thanks a lot
Baseball belongs to God. And the Pirate Bay.

upsdave, Thank you very much for this. All 9 innings are done and I will seed for a long time! This is GREAT! And I can confirm that Inning 10 from 1995 - Present is in the works as per Ken Burns himself in January 2010. The rumors are over! Baseball is a must have for any fan of the game - upsdave, on behalf of those who didn't take a minute of their lives to thank you - "Thank you for your work."

Wow!  Just an enormous THANK YOU to upsdave and ALL seeders [I see you there, American, Canadian and German friends].  I live in a place with limited internet and all of your patience during my extensive download of all parts is greatly appreciated.  I have wanted this doc for a while now.

I will be seeding this for quite some time!  Cheers!
Looked for a stream everywhere, thanks for this!
Hello! Excellent upload man! Thank you! Sorry to bother, but does anyone knows where I can find the english subtitles for this??
